amendment.description: Amendment adds language to prevent illegal immigrants from owning or renting housing built by funds from the affordable housing fund by requiring adult occupants of that housing to establish their legal residency through the use of secure forms of identification.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to prevent illegal immigrants from owning or renting housing built by funds from the affordable housing fund by requiring adult occupants of that housing to establish their legal residency through the use of secure forms of identification.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 188 (Roll no. 387).
